content: bonjour/hi hat by melissa clulow the bonjour / hi hat is a super simple and very wearable pattern that knits up quickly with mohair / silk laceweight yarn held double light and airy it s the perfect hat for transitioning from fall into winter and because it practically knits itself you may just want to make a wardrobe of these yarn espace tricot halo 72% mohair / 28% silk 459 y 420 m / 50 g 1 skein shown in bonjour / hi or approximately 257 yds 235 m of a similar laceweight yarn please note that two strands are held together throughout needles gauge needle size 5 mm us 8 - 16 /40 cm circular needle and dpns- or size needed to obtain gauge smaller needle size 4 5 mm us 7 - 16 /40 cm circular needle - or one size smaller than gauge needle tools stitch marker to mark beginning of round tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge 19 sts and 24 rnds = 10 cm / 4 after blocking size finished circumference 18 5 / 47 cm finished height 11 25 / 28 5 cm abbreviations co cast on k knit k1tbl knit one stitch through the back loop k3tog knit three stitches together p purl st s stitch es espace tricot | www espacetricot com bonjour / hi hat pattern with smaller 16 circular needles and two strands of yarn held together co 88 sts place a marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist the stitches knit 1 round brim round 1 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round repeat last round for 1 x 1 twisted rib until work measures 1 5 / 4 cm from co edge body work in stockinette knitting every row until hat measures 3 / 7 5 cm from co edge switch to main gauge needle continue working in stockinette until hat measures between 7 5 and 8 5 / 19 cm - 21 5 cm depending on desired amount of slouch those with smaller heads may prefer to knit the hat a little shorter note that crown shaping will add approximately 2 75 / 7 cm of length crown shaping switch to dpns when necessary round 1 *k19 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 2 and all even rnds knit round 3 *k17 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 5 *k15 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 7 *k13 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 9 *k11 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 11 *k9 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 13 *k7 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 15 *k5 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 17 *k3 k3tog repeat from * 3 more times round 18 knit - 16 sts remain finishing cut the yarn and pass through remaining stitches weave in ends and block enjoy your finished hat bonjour /
